pkgmetadata.longdescription: Bayesian Latent Variable Analysis // Fit a variety of Bayesian latent variable models, including confirmatory factor analysis, structural equation models, and latent growth curve models. References: Merkle Rosseel (2018) doi:10.18637/jss.v085.i04; Merkle et al. (2021) doi:10.18637/jss.v100.i06.
